summary.span: 命名空间为使用 DTD 或 XML 流填充缓存提供支持。

span.span: The namespace provides support for prepopulating the cache with DTDs or XML streams.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间定义和 枚举。 The namespace defines the and the enumeration. 当不需要自动调用网络或不可能时，将用作解析程序。 is used as a resolver when automatic calls to the network are not desired or are not possible. 例如，此类型可用于加载缓存的外部 Dtd。For example, this type can be used for loading cached external DTDs. 另一种情况是加载 xhtml ，并使用预加载 xhtml 1.0 中定义的已知 dtd。Another scenario is loading XHTML and using to preload well-known DTDs that are defined in XHTML 1.0. 预加载已知的 DTD 不会调用任何网络连接，因为这些 Dtd 已经嵌入到 Utils 程序集中。Preloading a well-known DTD does not invoke any network connections because these DTDs are already embedded in the System.Xml.Utils assembly. 当前包含 XHTML 1.0 和 RSS 0.91 dtd。Currently, includes XHTML 1.0 and RSS 0.91 DTDs. 枚举定义可识别的已知 dtd。 The enumeration defines which well-known DTDs the recognizes. 枚举包含 `Rss091` 、、和 `All` 值。 `Xhtml10` `None`The enumeration contains the `Xhtml10`, `Rss091`, `All`, and `None` values. `XmlKnownDtd.Xhtml10``T:System.Xml.Resolvers.XmlPreloadedResolver`指定将识别在 XHTML 1.0 中定义的 dtd 和实体。`XmlKnownDtd.Xhtml10` specifies that the `T:System.Xml.Resolvers.XmlPreloadedResolver` will recognize DTDs and entities that are defined in XHTML 1.0. 有关 XHTML 的详细信息，请参阅[xhtml 1.0 规范](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=109812)。For more information about XHTML, see the [XHTML 1.0 specification](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=109812). `XmlKnownDtd.Rss091``T:System.Xml.Resolvers.XmlPreloadedResolver`指定将识别在 RSS 0.91 中定义的 dtd 和实体。`XmlKnownDtd.Rss091` specifies that the `T:System.Xml.Resolvers.XmlPreloadedResolver` will recognize DTDs and entities that are defined in RSS 0.91. `XmlKnownDtd.All`指定将识别当前支持的所有 dtd。`XmlKnownDtd.All` specifies that the will recognize all currently supported DTDs. 这是默认行为。This is the default behavior. `XmlKnownDtd.None`指定将不识别任何预定义的 dtd。`XmlKnownDtd.None` specifies that the will not recognize any of the predefined DTDs. > [!NOTE] > 预加载已知的 DTD 时，它不会调用网络连接，因为 dtd 已嵌入到 Utils 程序集中。When the preloads a well-known DTD, it does not invoke network connections because the DTDs are already embedded in the System.Xml.Utils assembly.
